title: 16A.48 REFUND OF ERRONEOUS DEPOSITS.
text:
A verified claim may be submitted to the concerned agency head for refund of money in the treasury to which the state is not entitled. The claimant must submit with the claim a complete statement of facts and reasons for the refund. The agency head shall consider and approve or disapprove the claim, attach a statement of reasons, and forward the claim to the commissioner for settlement.
The amount needed to pay a refund under subdivision 1 is appropriated to the person entitled to it from the fund to which the money was credited.
